TextJPN: 「………今年の祟り、ってことっすかね」
「…そういうことになるんですかねぇ。……毎年いろんな殺し方を見せてくれますが、今年は特に際立っていますねぇ」
TextENG: ``...That's what it looks like. ...He kills them differently every year, but this is particularly conspicuous, isn't it?``

TextJPN: 「自分で自分の喉を掻き破るなんて…。…普通じゃないっす…」
TextENG: ``Clawing out your own throat... ...That isn't normal...``

TextJPN: 「あとは鑑識のじいさまに任せましょう。…きっと何かの怪しげな薬物を検出してくれるに違いありません」
TextENG: ``Let's leave the rest to the old man in forensics. ...I'm sure he'll find some suspicious drugs.``

TextJPN: 「お疲れさまです！　お疲れさまでーす！！」
TextENG: ``Thank you! Thank you for your hard work!!``

TextJPN: 「あ、大石さん！　小宮山さんたちが到着しました！」
TextENG: ``Oh, Ooishi-san! Komiyama-san and the others have arrived!``

TextJPN: 「大石さん、お疲れさまです！　今年は一等、キてるのが出たらしいじゃないですか」
TextENG: ``Ooishi-san, much appreciated! Well, it would seem we have a pretty crazy one this year.``

TextJPN: 「えぇ。裏をかかれました。@k@vS20/11/440700224.……私ゃてっきり、今夜死ぬのは北条鉄平だとばかり思ってたんですがね…」
TextENG: ``Yes. We've been outsmarted.@k@vS20/11/440700224. ...I was absolutely under the impression Teppei Houjou would get killed tonight...``

TextJPN: 「富竹ジロウ。年に何回か雛見沢に来てる趣味の写真家さんです。@k@vS20/11/440700226.……ノーマークだったなぁ…」
TextENG: ``Jirou Tomitake. A photographer with a hobby for coming to Hinamizawa a few times a year.@k@vS20/11/440700226. ...We didn't even have him marked...``

TextJPN: 「…どうなんでしょうね。北条宅にずっと張り付いてたのがバレて、ターゲットを変更したとか」
TextENG: ``...I wonder what happened? Did they realize we were watching the Houjou residence the whole time and decide to switch their target?``

TextJPN: 「で、北条鉄平の方は何も問題なし？」
TextENG: ``And there are no problems with Teppei Houjou?``

TextJPN: 「えぇ。夕方頃に娘が祭りに出掛けて、その少し後にバイクで出掛けまして。@k@vS20/11/440700229.…先に娘が帰ってきて、…あれ？@k@vS20/11/440700230.　まだ帰ってないかな？@k@vS20/11/440700231.　どっかで飲んだくれてるのかな…？」
TextENG: ``Correct. His daughter left for the festival in the evening, and a little while later, he left on his motorbike.@k@vS20/11/440700229. ...His daughter came back first... wait.@k@vS20/11/440700230. Has he not come back yet?@k@vS20/11/440700231. Is he still out drinking somewhere...?``

TextJPN: 「大石さん、いらっしゃいますかぁ？！　高杉課長からです。@k@vS20/00/KeijiB44012.１号車の無線にお願いします！！」
TextENG: ``Ooishi-san, are you there?! Call from Chief Takasugi.@k@vS20/00/KeijiB44012. He's on the line in Car 1!!``
